org.easybatch.core.validator

Interface RecordValidator<R extends Record>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - The record type this validator can validate.
    All Superinterfaces:
    RecordProcessor<R,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchValidator, BeanValidationRecordValidator

    public interface RecordValidator<R extends Record>
extends RecordProcessor<R,R>
    Interface for record validator. This is used to apply validation logic on input records.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R processRecord(R record)
      Validate a record.

    • Method Detail

      • processRecord

        R processRecord(R record)
                               throws RecordValidationException
        Validate a record.
        Specified by:
        processRecord in interface RecordProcessor<R extends Record,R extends Record>
        Parameters:
        record - the record to validate.
        Returns:
        the record if it should continue in the pipeline
        Throws:
        RecordValidationException - thrown if the record is not valid and should be rejected
